text: وَءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَلَّا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِى وَكِيلًا

translation.en.sahih: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Kami berikan kepada Musa kitab (Taurat) dan Kami jadikan kitab Taurat itu petunjuk bagi Bani Israil (dengan firman): "Janganlah kamu mengambil penolong selain Aku,
